Identify the name of the latest PSNU x IM MER Structured Data Set

```{r}

file <- glamr::return_latest("../Data/", "PSNU_IM_FY2") %>% print()

```

Read MSD

```{r}
mer_df <- gophr::read_psd(file, save_rds = TRUE, remove_txt = FALSE)
```
